triggers: family gatherings where future plans are discussed
mental_health.therapy_history: attended cognitive-behavioral therapy sessions a few years ago, considering returning for support

goals: to feel more confident about retirement
to establish a new routine post-career
to connect with others in similar situations
to manage anxiety related to financial security
barriers: feeling overwhelmed by the prospect of change
backstory: After a successful 40-year career in marketing and branding, she is now grappling with retirement. Linda has dedicated her life to her work, and the thought of stepping away from her role is causing her significant anxiety. She's also concerned about maintaining her financial stability and finding new social outlets outside her former job.
